#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long int

int arr[100000000];

ll sieve(ll n1,ll n2)
{
    ll n=std::max(n1,n2);
    arr[1]=1;
int count=0;

    for(int i=2;i*i<=n;i++)
    {
        if(arr[i]==0)
        {
            for(int j=2*i;j<=n;j+=i)
            arr[j]=1;
        }
    }
    for(int i=n1;i<=n2;i++)
    {
        if(arr[i]==0)
            count++;
    }
    return count;

}


int main()
{
    std::ios::sync_with_stdio(0);

    ll n1,n2,t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
cin>>n1>>n2;
cout<<sieve(n1,n2)<<endl;
}

    return 0;
}
